title: Isabelle font
content:
I'm a huuuuuge fan of the 'Isabelle' font, but I don't know what it is.  
It reminds me of Bodoni and Didot but the serifs of Isabelle are smaller. And the 'A' is different, does anybody know what it is?

[https://creativemarket.com/bluchic/13185-Isabelle-Theme/screenshots/#scr...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317115731/https:/creativemarket.com/bluchic/13185-Isabelle-Theme/screenshots/#screenshot1 "https://creativemarket.com/bluchic/13185-Isabelle-Theme/screenshots/#screenshot1")

Font: 

 Elsie

author: Cailinion
